title: Complicating Love - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clingy Lover   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Models   Modern Day   Possessive Characters   Yandere
author: 神風団十郎重国
description: This story is about a girl named Yuki Haneyama who gets drunk and sleeps in the train when trying to get back home only to be woken up by the station staff saying the last train has stopped. Yuki leaves the train station and starts to feel nauseous and vomits on the side of the road. She is then helped by the female lead Aoi Sera and so the two characters meet, and the story starts.>
